original_title: Denyo Japan donates 300 ESK model generator to NPQS to upgrade facilities
original_body_lines: Denyo Co. Ltd., Japan donated a 300 ESK model Denyo generator to National Plant Quarantine Service (NPQS) Katunayake, to upgrade its facilities. The generator was installed and commissioned on 27 August by Premier Electric Co. Ltd., sole agent and authorised distributor for Denyo generators in Sri Lanka.
